item.title: Reels/Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled Video Editor to create compelling and visually stunning clips and short reels for our social media channels. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to produce high-quality content that resonates with our target audience.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit and produce short-form video content for social media platforms, including Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Facebook Watch.
Collaborate with the content creation team to develop creative concepts and storyboards.
Ensure all video content aligns with the brand’s voice, style, and messaging.
Incorporate graphics, animations, and other visual effects to enhance video content.
Optimize videos for various social media platforms, ensuring the best quality and performance.
Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in social media and video editing.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting tight deadlines without compromising quality.
Work closely with the marketing team to ensure content is engaging and drives audience interaction.
Provide creative input and contribute to brainstorming sessions for new video ideas.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, or similar tools.
Knowledge of social media platforms and the specific requirements for video content on each.
Strong understanding of visual storytelling and the ability to create engaging content.
Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Strong communication skills and the ability to take constructive feedback.
Basic knowledge of graphic design and animation is a plus.
Experience with motion graphics and visual effects is an advantage.

15$ per Reel

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Skills: Instagram Reels, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Music Video 3 minutes creation/ editing - Upwork
item.description:
This is a music video production.
I have existing footage that I want to use that has the 2 main vocalists singing with a green screen behind leaving the option to create a great background and storyline.
The audio is fully mastered and mixed ready to be used. video length is 3:20 and I would love to discuss concept and direction of the video with the videographer/editing/ producer. I will share what I have in a google drive and will need to have a short meeting to make sure we are aligned with the direction I want to have and express my goals for final results. This will be used for You Tube and to promote this composition/music. I hope to find someone that can create backgrounds using a green screen of footage that is already made and perhaps be open for some animations in the video too. Looking forward to connecting with you if you feel that this is something you would be invested and interested in doing. Thank you ,

Budget: $850
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MOV, AVI, MP4, Footage-Based Video, Music & Sound Design, Video Animation, YouTube Video, Music Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: MOV, AVI, MP4, Footage-Based Video, Music & Sound Design, Video Animation, YouTube Video, Music Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: eCommerce Video-Editors needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to join our dynamic team. As a Video Editor, you will play a crucial role in creating captivating video advertisements that showcase the promoted products in the best possible light. The ideal candidate is highly skilled, detail-oriented, and has a proven track record of producing wow-effect video content for e-commerce brands.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate closely with the marketing team to conceptualize and create compelling video ads that align with brand objectives and messaging.
Edit and enhance raw footage to produce high-quality video content.
Incorporate visual effects, graphics, and animations to elevate the overall appeal and engagement of video ads.
Ensure all video content is polished, on-brand, and meets the highest standards of quality and creativity.
Utilize Video Sales Letters (VSL) techniques to create engaging and persuasive video content.
Apply principles of direct response marketing to drive viewer engagement and conversions.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your work, particularly in creating video ads for e-commerce brands.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Solid understanding of video production techniques, including color grading, audio editing, and motion graphics.
Exceptional attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics, composition, and storytelling.

Apply now with your eCommerce video portfolio to be considered for this exciting opportunity.




Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Help Improving my Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I recently launched a new Youtube channel and am looking for someone to help me improve it.

The channel is focused on optimizing Shopify stores. I am planning to create many more videos in the short-term but would need someone to guide me.

If you believe you can help me scale my Youtube channel, feel free to apply. For the application, please take a quick look at my channel and suggest the top 2-3 points of improvements that you can help me tackle. You can find my channel under: Artikuno or @Artikuno_Commerce (with the blue logo sign).

Note I am willing to pay this higher hourly rate but also offer additional bonuses if the channel hits certain subscriber counts.

Hourly Range: $80.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:53 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Engagement, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Editing, Social Media Management

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Video Editor to join our team. This role will focus on creating engaging short video edits from our previous events for promotional use on social media platforms, particularly Facebook ads.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit video footage from previous events to create 3 to 5 short promotional videos (15-30 seconds each).
- Ensure videos are engaging, high-quality, and aligned with our brand’s messaging and style.
- Incorporate graphics, text overlays, sound effects, and music to enhance videos.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand the goals and objectives for each video.
- Optimize videos for various social media platforms, ensuring the best format and resolution.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in video editing and social media marketing.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling, pacing, and editing techniques.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Experience in creating video content for social media platforms, especially Facebook.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate with team members.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience in creating promotional videos for events.
- Knowledge of motion graphics and animation.
- Understanding of Facebook Ads and video marketing strategies.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos, ensuring they align with our brand and meet our creative standards. item.title: Videographer for Broadcast studio in Las Vegas, - Upwork
item.description:
We have a broadcast studio in Las Vegas and we are looking for someone who can be our local video expert for the studio.  Needs experience and expertise in lighting, color balancing, color matching cameras and making the overall composition of the camera look professional.  Willing to change and evaluate, camera placements, light placement and assess equipment needs.  We have a live show that airs 5 days a week, there is minimal recording and very little video editing done in studio. We will require changing video settings, lighting and camera menus, on the fly while live.  We use black magic cameras, Panasonic cameras, vMix and many other software programs in our shoot.  Please feel free to inquire about questions. (Must live in Las Vegas)

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Cinematography, Video Lighting, Color Balancing, TV Broadcasting
Skills: Videography, Camera, Cinematography, Video Lighting, Color Balancing, TV Broadcasting
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation

item.title: Spanish video editor needed for UGC ad agency - Upwork
item.description:
THE OPPORTUNITY
- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for making *conversion-optimized* Spanish video ads comprised of user-generated video content.
- Must have a strong proficiency in creating long-form content
- Must have prior experience editing *direct response* video ads
- Must have experience in creating "Tik-Tok" style content
- Creative agency experience is a *huge* plus
- This role requires ~5-10 hours / week to start with increased hours within 1-2 months.


WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Automotive Video Editor (IG Reels & YT Shorts) - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor specializing in automotive content to create engaging IG Reels and YouTube Shorts for our brand.

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the automotive industry, exceptional editing skills, and a keen eye for detail.

Responsibilities:
1. Editing both short-form and long-form videos for various platforms, incorporating
2. Color grading
3. Imagine stabilization
4. Sound design
5. Motion graphics

TO APPLY:
1. Please let me know what video editor you are using
2. Share example of your automotive work - ONLY AUTOMOTIVE EXAMPLES
    ALT: if you don't have automotive examples, I have sample footage if you'd like to demo your skills.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00

item.title: 15 second Google Earth Video, zoom to address - Upwork
item.description:
Need a video developed from using Google Earth (pro), which starts with a global view then zooms along the following path:
United States
Texas
Fly past Dallas from the south (heading northward)
Zoom to this address in Denton Texas: 300 S Western Blvd, Denton, TX 76206

Total running time= under 15 seconds
No audio necessary.
Final few seconds should have a banner across the 1/3 of the screen (chyron) that reads "Denton is 40 miles northwest of Downtown Dallas"

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:30 UTC
Category: Video Production

item.title: Closed Captioning YouTube Videos - Must have experience and excellent English - Upwork
item.description:
I have YouTube videos that need to be captioned. You must have the software to return an SRT file. Not only do the files need captions but they also must have correct English, spelling, and grammar.  This pays $0.70 per audio minute, so for 10 minutes of video, you get $7.

Thanks!
Sarah

Hourly Range: $7.00
